channel.title: Conte and Kenny Show
channel.description: Looking for a talk show without limitations? Well look no further. Listen to us live every Monday night on Cringehumorradio.com 7-10 pm. We will podcast entire shows (unless noted) warts and all.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Explicit, Humor, Sex, Comedy, News, Religion, Violence, Sports, History, Games, Movies, News
channel.itunes:author: Conte and Kenny Show

item.title: Oct 5th The Conteless and Kenny Show
item.description: With Conte out ( performing in reno nevada) Mike Gaffney fills in and does a fine job. Besides them wishing Conte would crash on his flight to the west coast ( him being in the air DURING the actual broadcast makes it a little eerie) they run the gammet on conte bashing. All done in love they do a fine job talking about other nonsense that conte would have talked about anyway. Tune in and enjoy the jealousy of kenny who wished he could be at "Catch a Rising Star" like his counterpart Conte.

J E T S JETS JETS JETS

Katie from Wisconsen sits in

Enjoy

item.title: July 27th Girls ,Girls ,Girls
item.description: NO.. Motley Crue didnt stop by, and we did not review one of Elvis's bad movies. We had 3 hot girls sittin in and we discussed things like the upcoming events on the lifetime channel,why are men so selfish,and whats the biggest difference between boys and girls. Not really, but we do try to dig into the creepy side of conte. Lots of other good stuff too. tune in to vaginaville

item.title: June 29th 2009 Death and Benadryl
item.description: Between the half of dozen famous deaths since the last show and Kennys "its the benadryl talkin" excuse, this show is bizzare in itself.The first show without bob on a regular basis,the talk of Michael Jackson of course takes presidence over most topics. We managed to squeeze in some Billy Mays,Farrah,Bernie Madoff, a 911 call from a McDonalds, and much more. O yea, Kenny has daydreams on the air of the freaky kinds, about what he wants to see and do with Conte and James. B-E-N-A-D-R-Y-L.. kenny takes it and we all laugh puzzled. Enjoy

item.title: June 1st 2009 New Studio!
item.description:
After a week off for memorial day, we start the summer in a NEW STUDIO in NJ, and we think we are going to LOVE it. We start off recapping the "Backseat BBQ Contest" some other things.
Conte tells an old story about an "almost 3some"
Gay kid is voted Prom Queen
Young girls are not very prudish
Teachers cant give F's anymore?
Are there any classic comedies in the last few years?
Joes friends dad loves penis??
and a little rapper boy who is 97 yrs old?
enjoy folks!

and much much more....enjoy kids!

item.title: May 11th 2009 No Comics Laughing
item.description:
Happy Mothers Day! We celebrate it with the Comedy Competition like none other. 5 Comics, 11 audience memebers( including the comics) and a huge peice of wood /box on stage basically in the way. NO COMICS LAUGHING is the best name for this possible.Listen to 5 comics perform in front of other comics, and the uncomfortabe silence shall begin. Definitly worth the wait. enjoy kids!
C AND K
